Author: among
Title: [ANN] [PRE-SALE] [AIRDROP] MapCoin | Driving the future of mapping technologies
Body: Mapcoin drives the creation of maps and location data using the power of our community. MapCoin's goal is to aid the collection of data for the whole autonomous vehicle and mapping industry. As a platform it helps to facilitate the collection of this data by allowing companies to create "Mapping Tasks". These tasks are then listed on the MapCoin website and registered users can accept the tasks to collect data.

Author: among
Title: [ANN] [PRE-SALE] [AIRDROP] MapCoin | Driving the future of mapping technologies
Body: The MapCoin Collectr App: is the easiest method for people to get started collecting and earning MapCoins for data. This is an app that can be downloaded and installed on a users phone. The app uses the camera in the phone to collect video data to be used for mapping. Once the app is installed the user simply has to mount the phone on the window of their car and then start the Collectr app. As they drive the app will collect video footage of the road and send it to MapCoin for processing

Author: mapcointoken
Title: [ANN] [PRE-SALE] [AIRDROP] MapCoin | Driving the future of mapping technologies
Body: Uber self-driving car expert, Edward Cui, joins Mapcoin  Here at Mapcoin we are incredibly excited to announce that Edward Cui, self-driving car expert at Uber, has joined us as a senior advisor.  Edward is a self-driving car veteran. He is one of the early members of the Uber self-driving car team, and an expert in machine learning and mapping technologies for self-driving cars.  He serves as the tech lead for the self-driving car mapping team to help scale map creation with the latest technologies.  He has a degree in Robotics from University of Pennsylvania.  Read more on medium https://medium.com/@Mapcointoken/ex-uber-self-driving-car-expert-edward-cui-joins-mapcoin-f185941aa495

Author: mapcointoken
Title: [ANN] [PRE-SALE] [AIRDROP] MapCoin | Driving the future of mapping technologies
Body: Hi, thanks for your questions  We don’t have big competitors atm, however, although it is really easy to to get into this space of data collection, true professional mapping data services require significant skills and experience to succeed. Only a few companies will have experienced teams to be able to process and analyse collected data as well as offering professional services on top. We are one of those.  Having our own token is key to us building out our tech, paying our data collectors, building support, driving marketing etc.  The main buyers are companies in the autonomous vehicles, mapping, smart cities, location spaces. The autonomous car market is expected to be worth between $450 - $750billion dollars by 2030. By October 2017 already $80billion2 had been invested in autonomous cars, with the USA and China leading the market.  Thanks again

Author: sundy399
Title: [ANN] [PRE-SALE] [AIRDROP] MapCoin | Driving the future of mapping technologies
Body: Before reading White Paper → Same as Google Map After reading the white paper → It is different from GoogleMap I thought that it would be very good to collect information at low cost by executing TASK to get reward.  I have a question. Tasks included videos and geotagged pictures. Will people's voices be collected? Do you plan to use that sound for research?  Also, can you use the reward of task we get with "MAPCOIN"? For example, if you put a user who wishes to move the route on the task, I thought it would be nice if I paid this coin with reward.

Author: JohnPierson
Title: [ANN] [PRE-SALE] [AIRDROP] MapCoin | Driving the future of mapping technologies
Body: Thank you for your detailed response, it’s clear. In which countries do you plan do deploy your service first? And what is the estimation on how many active users do you need to effectively operate and cover city/country map? I think it should be expressed in MapCoin local users per local people or living are /length of roads. Thanks

Author: mapcointoken
Title: [ANN] [PRE-SALE] [AIRDROP] MapCoin | Driving the future of mapping technologies
Body: Our token will be used to reward our users for collecting map data. At present most data people generate are being used without any rewards.

Author: mapcointoken
Title: [ANN] [PRE-SALE] [AIRDROP] MapCoin | Driving the future of mapping technologies
Body: It depends on the size and complexity of City and country, but for HD Maps, for tier-one city like London, Paris, New York, Shenzhen, HK, we need at least 4000-5000 active users to make it, smaller cities may require fewer. The reason for that is: for example Shenzhen city, in Shenzhen city there are around 19,000 taxis and 16,000 buses that cover all the city roads, For MapCoin 1/4 of the bus/taxi drivers is enough.  We will look to concentrate our efforts in major US cites, eg San Francisco, Germany and Korea. That being said users can collect download our app and start collecting data from any area.

Author: mapcointoken
Title: [ANN] [PRE-SALE] [AIRDROP] MapCoin | Driving the future of mapping technologies
Body: This is exactly our idea Users will be rewarded with MAP tokens for driving certain routes, taking images of POI's, etc.

Author: mapcointoken
Title: [ANN] [PRE-SALE] [AIRDROP] MapCoin | Driving the future of mapping technologies
